function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conducting observational studies during a pandemic may pose a risk of exposure to the virus for researchers and participants.","Impact":"Potential spread of the contagious disease and risk to the health of researchers and participants.","Mitigation":"Implement strict safety protocols and guidelines, including the use of personal protective equipment (PPE) and adherence to social distancing measures during data collection.","Technologies":"Remote data collection methods and virtual observation techniques can be used to minimize in-person exposure.","People":"Researchers, participants, and anyone involved in the data collection process.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities, and ethical review boards."},{"Description":"Use of public databases and access to information about contagious diseases may lead to the inadvertent spread of misinformation or panic through social media.","Impact":"Dissemination of inaccurate information and potential increase in public anxiety and fear.","Mitigation":"Evaluate information sources for accuracy and reliability before dissemination, provide clear and accurate communication, and promote verified information from credible sources.","Technologies":"Data verification algorithms, fact-checking tools, and social media monitoring platforms can be utilized to identify and counteract misinformation.","People":"Researchers, public health authorities, and social media users.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities, and social media platforms."}]}
